author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Going over the Egamma reco code to work on the EGM paper I checked out once again the `ElectronSeedProducer`. This time I noticed that the option `preFilteredSeeds` is `false` and it apparently has been for the long time. In this situation, the producer does not use the `SeedFilter` class from the EgammaElectronAlgos library. I therefore suggest to remove the usage of this class and the class itself, so the `ElectronSeedProducer` can live with much less configuration parameters. Like this the plugin is easier to understand and I also hope that this way, it gets easier apparent in the future how this plugin can potentially be unified or replaced with the `ElectronNHitSeedProducer` which is used at the HLT.

Furthermore, I merged the `.h` and `.cc` files of some other producers in the electron reconstruction chain.

This PR does not collide with my two PRs from earlier today (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29303, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29295):

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles, matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Remove unused SeedFilter class in EgammaElectronAlgos to simplify ElectronSeedProducer
